scripts.build-browser: cd game_browser && ./node_modules/.bin/check-dependencies --install || npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-server: git describe --dirty > .version && npm run ensure-tooling -- -q && cargo build --release
scripts.build: echo 'Building browser UI' && npm run build-browser && echo 'Building server' && npm run build-server
scripts.lint: echo 'CHECKING BEST PRACTISES (game_common)' && touch game_common/src/lib.rs && cargo clippy && echo 'CHECKING BEST PRACTISES (game_browser) -- IGNORE js_export RELATED ERRORS' && touch game_browser/src/lib.rs && cd game_browser && (cargo clippy || true) && cd .. && echo 'CHECKING/FIXING FORMATTING' && cargo fmt -- ./game_common/src/lib.rs ./game_server/main.rs ./game_browser/src/lib.rs
